Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2009 01:02PM dsantrizos wrote: My daughter had a double masectomy in January of this year. Right side with lymphectomy. For some reason they put port in her right arm, even though she told them it was her bad side. She not only has a great deal of pain, she now has a very stiff cord going the full length of her arm. Not sure if its an artery or tendon or nerve. she is having ultrasound of her arm today followed by a portagram. Has anyone else had similar problems? I will keep you posted as to the findings. You are all my heroes.
Posts.Title: Port-a Cath pain? TinaLee Kicks
